title: Quantifying the supply-demand relationship of ecosystem services to identify ecological management zoning: A case study in mountainous areas of northwest Yunnan, China
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Xiaobao Wang, Xiaoqing Zhao, Yifei Xu, Yuju Ran, Xianmin Ye, Yuqin Zhou, Beihao Wu, Bocheng Chu
